channel.title: Data Analysis Portfolio on Zehida
channel.description: Recent content in Data Analysis Portfolio on Zehida

item.title: Project 3: Transforming HR Analytics with PowerBI
item.description: In this project, I developed an HR analytics dashboard using Power BI. The dashboard provides an overview of various HR metrics such as headcount, attrition rate, diversity, and recruitment sources. It also allows users to analyze trends and patterns in these metrics over time and across different departments or locations. The dashboard features interactive visualizations and filters, making it easy to explore the data and gain insights. Overall, this HR analytics dashboard can help organizations make data-driven decisions and improve their HR operations.

item.title: Project 4: Exploring Netflix Movie Data with SQL
item.description: This project used SQL to analyze a database of Netflix movies. The data was used to uncover trends and patterns in the types of movies offered, the genres most popular with subscribers, percentage of movies and shows Netflix has produced, and more. The results of the analysis were used to provide insights into how Netflix can better optimize its movie selection and improve subscriber satisfaction. Link to Github Repository

item.title: Project 1: Data Cleaning With Microsoft Excel
item.description: Auto-fitted column rows and heights Checked for blank rows and columns Checked for correct data type and changed the incorrect ones to their correct data types Performed simple calculations using Excel formulas on the numeric columns and got incorrect answers Reformatted the numeric columns using different steps to prepare the dataset for working on. Link to Medium article

item.title: Project 2: Using Microsoft Excel For Effective Payroll Management
item.description: This payroll I did with Microsoft Excel is a spreadsheet designed to track employee hours and wages. It included columns for employee name, hours worked, hourly rate, overtime hours, overtime rate, and total wages due. It also included various formulas such as VLOOKUP to create a drop down list to view each customer’s details, SUMIF, COUNTIF, IF, AVERAGE, MAXIMUM, SUM, MINIMUM A dashboard was built at the end to visualize the payroll summary.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! My name is Zehida Thabit and I am a data analyst. I strive to showcase my skills, knowledge, and experience in data analysis. I have a particular focus on data visualization, and analysis. I am proficient in various technologies and tools such as Excel, Tableau, PowerBI and SQL. I have experience in working with large datasets and transforming them into meaningful insights. My skillset includes data extraction, data cleaning and preparation, statistical analysis, and data visualization.
